thoughts.text: I think it would be useful to search for hyperlinks on a website.
thoughts.reasoning: Searching for hyperlinks on a website can help me find related content or useful resources. It can also be a good way to explore a website and to discover new information.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the get_hyperlinks command to search for hyperlinks on the website.
- Specify the url as a string.
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful to specify a valid URL and to avoid searching for sensitive or confidential information.
thoughts.speak: I would like to search for hyperlinks on a website. I will be careful to specify a valid URL and to avoid searching for sensitive or confidential information.
